title: ECIL Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 412 Apprentice Posts
description: Electronics Corporation of India Limited  (ECIL) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 412 Apprentice Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the ITI can grab this chance and apply for ECIL Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, and salary structure. educational details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online through the website on or before the last date...
